item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Which voters should Politicians Target during Elections?
item.description: Introduction Thereâ€™s a common saying for anyone running for a political position: every vote counts. However, during the election seasons many politicians may be losing a significant portion of their potential votes by missing certain groups with their campaigns. Every time the elections roll around in Canada, the Canadian Election Study conducts a massive survey of eligible voters for eager statisticians to analyze. I decided to look through their phone survey conducted in 2019 and found some interesting patterns presenting new research opportunities.
